titleStmt.title: To J.S., the author of Sure-footing, his letter, lately published, The answer of Mer. Casaubon, D.D., concerning the new way of infallibility lately devised to uphold the Roman cause, the Holy Scriptures, antient fathers and councills laid aside
titleStmt.author: Casaubon, Meric, 1599-1671.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
